10.ara-name: كتاب الجنائز عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Musa bin Abi Musa Al-Asha'ri narrated from his father that:The Messenger of Allah said: "No one dies and they stand over him crying and saying: 'O what a great man he was! O how respectful he was!' except that two angels are appointed for him to poke him (saying): 'Is that you?

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الْبُكَاءِ عَلَى الْمَيِّتِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked To Cry Over The Deceased
